game_description: Play with your own virtual dog in this beautiful open world landscape! This is a serious game that promotes relaxation and brings joy and relief to your stressful day. We will soon make this dog game even more realistic with hand gestures, voice recognition, more interactions and more beautiful landscapes. Play this game for 10-15 minutes each day to reap the most benefits! Sitting will reduce motion sickness. This game has no particular goal, no items to collect and no levels to reach. That is why it is so relaxing. It is just you and your dog in this beautiful open world landscape. Many families and individuals cannot afford a real dog due to lack of time, space and money. This virtual dog gives you the benefits of a real dog without the hassle. This game might even help people who are afraid of dogs to be more comfortable around dogs.
review_1: Together with a dog in nature, that has something relaxing. You can call the dog, let him sit or lie down or play ball with him. It would be nice if more landscapes are added and possibly also different dogs.
review_2: the dog is rigid, and not able to eye contact with you. the commend is so inconvenient. not much activity you can play with the dog
